org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.humanoid.player

Interface CooldownEvent.Set

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, CooldownEvent, Event, TargetEntityEvent, TargetHumanoidEvent, TargetLivingEvent, TargetPlayerEvent
    Enclosing interface:
    CooldownEvent

    public static interface CooldownEvent.Set
extends CooldownEvent, Cancellable
    Handles an ItemType being given a cooldown for a Player.

    The cooldowns are all in ticks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.humanoid.player.CooldownEvent
